EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Step Forward Assessment Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Step Forward
Invitation to Assessment.
Dear [name of applicant],
Thank you for applying to Step Forward and congratulations on reaching this stage! We were very impressed with your application and would like to invite you to our assessment event on [date] from [arrival time].
The assessment event is an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and find out if Step Forward is the right programme for you.
Please fill in the form here to let us know if you can attend or not.
If it’s impossible for you to attend this date, there are later assessments taking place in [month & month], however, we cannot guarantee that there will still be places on the programme by then.
The assessment is scheduled to last Time to be confirmed - with breaks in between. The day will include a mixture of general team based activities, specific tasks related to your work option, and individual interviews. The activities are designed to be fun and get the best out of you so please don’t worry! There will be some time in between activities so feel free to bring a book or some other reading material.
You will need to bring some documents with you. We will need to see both the original document AND a photocopy of:
A passport OR a UK provisional or full driving license (photo card and counterpart) OR a UK birth certificate Your GCSE/Level 2 certificate in English and Maths or Functional Skills
As there are limited places and Step Forward is a selective programme, we want to help you do your best in the assessment. Handy tips on how to ace an assessment event will be coming soon via social media so like us on facebook and follow us on twitter.
We’re looking forward to seeing you soon!
